text: A Place in the Sun is a 1951 American romantic drama movie directed by George Stevens and based on the 1925 novel An American Tragedy by Theodore Dreiser and the 1926 play of the same name of the novel. It stars Montgomery Clift, Herbert Heyes, Elizabeth Taylor, Shelley Winters, Anne Revere, Raymond Burr and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for 9 Oscars and won 6 Academy Awards in 1952. ==Other websites== * * Category:1951 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by George Stevens Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Black-and-white movies Category:1950s English-language movies
title: A Place in the Sun
